name: Lion's Guard Outpost
desc: An outpost for the infamous Lion's Guard, this military structure provides a rallying point for Lion's Guard patrols to be sent out to protect the local area. Due to its smaller nature compared to a proper headquarters the costs of amenities are handed off to the public sector, much to the chagrin of the local populace.

name: Fuel Depot
desc: A fuel depot designed to maintain a stockpile of antimatter fuel for the planet. Boosts antimatter fuel stocks in the market.

name: Volturnian Lobster Garden
desc: Both a high-class restaurant serving the best that Volturn has to offer as well as a marvelous tourism destination for the people of the Askonia system and beyond, the Volturnian Lobster Garden is the home of Sindrian Fuel's mascot Volturn-y the Volturnian Lobster. Rumor has it that people that reservations go back up to 5 cycles. Truly there is no tourism destination better known in the entirety of the Persean Sector.

name: Nachiketa Fuel Traders, Inc. HQ
desc: Headquarters of the Nachiketa Fuel Traders, Incorporated, NFT, Inc. operates its fuel company out of his structure. Both a major center of fuel production and commanding a respectable merchant fleet, Nachiketa Fuel keeps itself in operation through a generous Hegemony sponsorship in return for ensuring enough fuel is ready for the various military fleets. The building itself is also heavily defended, comparable to a military base to ensure that no rival will be able to threaten the vital life line of interstellar operations.
